pkgmetadata.longdescription: # iisi-pythonpipenv install -d# pipenv requirements > .requirements.txtpipenv shell[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/iisi.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/iisi)[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/iisi.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/iisi)-----**Table of Contents**- [Installation](#installation)- [License](#license)## Installation```consolepip install iisi-python```## License`iisi-python` is distributed under the terms of the [MIT](https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html) license.
